entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'Harry Potter'. (Excerpt: 'Happy now, are yeh, that yeh didn’ ﬁght, yeh cowardly bunch o’ nags? Are yeh happy Harry Potter’s — d–dead . . . ?')

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts and a close friend of Harry's. (Excerpt: 'Hagrid’s unexpected bellow nearly forced Harry’s eyes open.')

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, referred to as 'Voldemort'. (Excerpt: 'Harry thought that Hagrid must have been forced to obey Voldemort’s command...')

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of followers of Voldemort. (Excerpt: 'The jeers of the Death Eaters were drowned.')

entities.name: centaurs
entities.description: A group of mythical creatures, referred to as 'centaurs'. (Excerpt: 'Harry wondered how many centaurs were watching their procession pass;')

relationships.description: Hagrid is forced to obey Voldemort's command. (Excerpt: 'Harry thought that Hagrid must have been forced to obey Voldemort’s command...')
Hagrid is in charge of the Death Eaters. (Excerpt: 'Hagrid could not continue, but broke down in fresh tears.')
The Death Eaters are insulting Harry Potter. (Excerpt: 'Some of the Death Eaters called insults at the centaurs as they left them behind.')
Hagrid is watching the centaurs. (Excerpt: 'Harry wondered how many centaurs were watching their procession pass;')
